trans-unit.source: Break (^C) will interrrupt the program immediately.

trans-unit.source: PlayerPiano amazes your friends by running Python doctests in a fake interactive shell.

trans-unit.source: Press enter to show the results block.

trans-unit.source: Pressing any keys will type source lines, stop at the end of each source block.
trans-unit.target: Pressing any keys will type source lines, stop at the end of each source block.

trans-unit.source: in another terminal before any output will be displayed. This is useful when presenting using a projector. Start a second xterm & run cat, then put it on the overhead (with the main terminal on your laptop). This allows you to see what you’re doing.
